products.title: Duoshade Blue Haze Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: Give your rooms a smart yet serene look with these duoshade blue haze pleated blinds. The wonderful, soft shade of blue is held by little honeycomb pockets, blackout lined for the ultimate shading. They also sit within their own special frame, one that clips onto your upvc window give your rooms a smart yet serene look with these duoshade blue haze pleated blinds.
